pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface for 'TiddlyWiki' // 'TiddlyWiki' is a unique non- linear notebook for capturing, organising and sharing complex information. 'rtiddlywiki' is a R interface of 'TiddlyWiki' https://tiddlywiki.com to create new tiddler from Rmarkdown file, and then put into a local 'TiddlyWiki' node.js server if it is available.
